Third-Party Libraries and Their Licenses
==========================================

This file contains the licenses for all third-party libraries used in the NomadEngine project.
All libraries are listed in alphabetical order.

1. Assimp (Open Asset Import Library)
   - License: BSD 3-Clause License
   - Repository: https://github.com/assimp/assimp
   - Description: A library to import and export various 3D-model-formats

2. Brotli
   - License: MIT License
   - Repository: https://github.com/google/brotli
   - Description: A generic-purpose lossless compression algorithm

3. BZip2
   - License: BZip2 License (BSD-style)
   - Repository: https://sourceforge.net/projects/bzip2/
   - Description: A freely available, patent free, high-quality data compressor

4. DirectX Math
   - License: MIT License
   - Repository: https://github.com/Microsoft/DirectXMath
   - Description: DirectXMath is an all inline SIMD C++ linear algebra library

5. DirectX Mesh
   - License: MIT License
   - Repository: https://github.com/Microsoft/DirectXMesh
   - Description: DirectXMesh geometry processing library

6. DirectX Tex
   - License: MIT License
   - Repository: https://github.com/Microsoft/DirectXTex
   - Description: DirectXTex texture processing library

7. DirectX Tool Kit 12
   - License: MIT License
   - Repository: https://github.com/Microsoft/DirectXTK12
   - Description: A collection of helper classes for writing DirectX 12 code in C++

8. Draco
   - License: Apache License 2.0
   - Repository: https://github.com/google/draco
   - Description: A library for compressing and decompressing 3D geometric meshes and point clouds

9. FMT
   - License: MIT License
   - Repository: https://github.com/fmtlib/fmt
   - Description: A modern formatting library

10. FMOD
    - License: FMOD Commercial License / FMOD Free License
    - Website: https://www.fmod.com/
    - Description: Audio engine and tools

11. FreeType
    - License: FreeType License (BSD-style)
    - Repository: https://github.com/freetype/freetype
    - Description: A freely available software library to render fonts

12. GLFW
    - License: zlib/libpng License
    - Repository: https://github.com/glfw/glfw
    - Description: A multi-platform library for OpenGL, OpenGL ES and Vulkan development

13. GLM (OpenGL Mathematics)
    - License: MIT License
    - Repository: https://github.com/g-truc/glm
    - Description: Header only C++ mathematics library for graphics software

14. Dear ImGui
    - License: MIT License
    - Repository: https://github.com/ocornut/imgui
    - Description: Bloat-free Graphical User interface for C++ with minimal dependencies

15. ImGuizmo
    - License: MIT License
    - Repository: https://github.com/CedricGuillemet/ImGuizmo
    - Description: Immediate mode 3D gizmo for scene editing and other controls

16. KubaZip
    - License: Unlicense (Public Domain)
    - Repository: https://github.com/kuba--/zip
    - Description: A portable, simple zip library written in C

17. libpng
    - License: PNG Reference Library License (libpng License)
    - Repository: https://github.com/glennrp/libpng
    - Description: The official PNG reference library

18. MiniZip
    - License: zlib License
    - Repository: https://github.com/madler/zlib (part of zlib)
    - Description: Mini zip and unzip based on zlib

19. OpenAL
    - License: LGPL 2.1
    - Repository: https://github.com/kcat/openal-soft
    - Description: A cross-platform 3D audio API

20. PlutoSVG
    - License: MIT License
    - Repository: https://github.com/sammycage/plutosvg
    - Description: A lightweight SVG rendering library

21. PlutoVG
    - License: MIT License
    - Repository: https://github.com/sammycage/plutovg
    - Description: A standalone 2D vector graphics library

22. Poly2Tri
    - License: BSD 3-Clause License
    - Repository: https://github.com/jhasse/poly2tri
    - Description: A 2D constrained Delaunay triangulation library

23. Polyclipping (Clipper)
    - License: Boost Software License 1.0
    - Repository: https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Clipper2
    - Description: An open source freeware polygon clipping library

24. PugiXML
    - License: MIT License
    - Repository: https://github.com/zeux/pugixml
    - Description: Light-weight, simple and fast XML parser for C++

25. RapidJSON
    - License: MIT License
    - Repository: https://github.com/Tencent/rapidjson
    - Description: A fast JSON parser/generator for C++

26. SDL3 (Simple DirectMedia Layer)
    - License: zlib License
    - Repository: https://github.com/libsdl-org/SDL
    - Description: A cross-platform development library

27. STB (Sean Barrett's Libraries)
    - License: MIT License / Public Domain
    - Repository: https://github.com/nothings/stb
    - Description: Single-file public domain libraries for C/C++

28. UTF8-CPP
    - License: Boost Software License 1.0
    - Repository: https://github.com/nemtrif/utfcpp
    - Description: UTF-8 with C++ in a Portable Way

29. zlib
    - License: zlib License
    - Repository: https://github.com/madler/zlib
    - Description: A massively spiffy yet delicately unobtrusive compression library
